revision.text:
'''Oak Items''' are special items given to the player by [[Professor Oak]] as they progress through the game. These items act as permanent upgrades to the player's account. ==Aquasition== Oak Items are gained by playing through the game and completing tasks such as gyms and dungeons. ==List of Items== {| class="roundtable sortable" style="background: #{{items color light}}; border:3px solid #{{items color dark}}" ! ! Name ! Order
Obtained |- | {{Bag3|Magic Ball}} | [[Magic Ball]] | 1st |- | {{Bag3|Amulet Coin}} | [[Amulet Coin]] | 2nd |- | {{Bag3|Poison Barb}} | [[Poison Barb]] | 3rd |- | {{Bag3|EXP Share}} | [[EXP Share]] | 4th |- | {{Bag3|Sprayduck}} | [[Sprayduck]] | 5th |- | {{Bag3|Shiny Charm}} | [[Shiny Charm]] | 6th |- | {{Bag3|Burn Drive}} | [[Blaze Cassette]] | 7th |- | {{Bag3|Cell Battery}} | [[Cell Battery]] | 8th |} {{Oak items}}
[[Category:Oak Items]]
